verses.verse: [A psalme, the song of the sonnes of Corach.] God loueth the gates of Sion more then all the dwellynges of Iacob: [for] her foundations are vpon the holy hilles.
(87:1) [for] her foundations are vpon the holy hilles.
(87:2) Uery excellent thinges are spoken of thee: O thou citie of God. Selah.
(87:3) I wyll make mention amongst those that knowe me, of Egypt and Babylon: behold also of Palestina and Tyre, with Ethiopia, [and it shalbe sayde] suche a man is borne there.
(87:4) But of Sion it shalbe reported, that very many be borne in her: and the most highest him selfe shall establishe her.
(87:5) God wyll number in the register of the people: euery one that is borne there. Selah.
(87:6) And the singers aswell as the players of instrumentes: yea al my fountaines are in thee.
